attributes.title: Buggy Lapping
attributes.description: Think you have the skill and consistency to dominate the track? This is your chance to prove it. Compete in the season's most demanding racing series and fight for the championship title.
attributes.prizes:
Stick around for a chance to win 10,000 TBUX in a dice roll after each event.

 Final Round Prize Pool! üèÜ

ü•á 1st Place: Walk away with the grand prize of 180,000 TBUX, a special surprise Buggy, and a loaded swag bag!
ü•à 2nd Place: Score a cool 90,000 TBUX and a swag bag!
ü•â 3rd Place: Grab 45,000 TBUX and a swag bag!
üèÖ 4th-10th Place: Nobody leaves empty-handed! All other finalists receive 20,000 TBUX and an awesome swag bag filled with items from top designers!
attributes.rules:
Tournament Rules & Code of Conduct

‚Ä¢ Be Kind & Courteous: Treat participants and staff with respect. Be aware of fellow lappers.

‚Ä¢ Zone Rules: No yelling, griefing, or arguing with event staff/participants.

‚Ä¢ Zero-Tolerance: Violations result in immediate disqualification and tournament ban.

‚Ä¢ A loaner buggy will be available to those who need it.


On-Track & Racing Rules

‚Ä¢ Starting Gate: Wait 10+ seconds for lapper ahead before starting to avoid bumping.

‚Ä¢ Track Exit: After flipping, head to nearest zone line to exit safely.

‚Ä¢ Technical Difficulties: If disconnected, rejoin and retry once resolved.

‚Ä¢ Warming up is encouraged, but please keep your practice times off the leaderboard.

‚Ä¢ No blocking the track. Please give other lappers space to do their laps.
attributes.registration_info: To join the Buggy Lapping Tournament, please find the latest event details by checking my profile under the "Buggy Lapping Tournament" group or by visiting the billboard in the Dust Devil zone. Once you have the information, you can sign up at the designated location and time.
